component.name: Voquill
component.summary: Cross-platform push-to-talk dictation app with Whisper-powered speech recognition

description.p: Voquill is a system-wide voice dictation application that converts speech to text using OpenAI's Whisper API. Unlike built-in dictation tools, Voquill works in any application and provides highly accurate transcription.

ul.li: Global push-to-talk hotkeys that work anywhere on your system
Direct keyboard simulation - speech becomes actual keystrokes
OpenAI Whisper integration for high accuracy speech recognition
Live visual feedback with unobtrusive overlay
Simple configuration for API keys and custom hotkeys

description.p: Perfect for content creation, coding, accessibility, and productivity. Works with any text input field - email, documents, browsers, code editors, and more.

screenshot.caption: Voquill in action - converting speech to text in any application
Simple configuration interface for API keys and hotkeys

description.p: Initial Flatpak release with cross-platform voice dictation support.
